name: 1.7.0-b5
body:
- Code cleanup
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/116, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/115
- Updated dependencies

name: 1.7.0-b4
body:
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/113, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/109, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/106
- Favorite wallpapers will be backed up on local storage (if storage permission granted) and immediately will be restored after user grant storage permission after reinstall the app. https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/108
- Added `setCropWallpaperByDefault()` to dashboard configuration https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/111. Read [here](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Dashboard-Configuration#how-to-configure-it) to use it.
- Added **Default** to language options. It will set app locale to match device locale.

name: 1.7.0-b3
body:
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/104
- Disable status bar color to fix this issue for now https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/103
- Crop wallpaper will be disabled until this issue is fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/102

name: 1.7.0-b2
body:
- Downgrade target api to 26 will fix this issue https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/102

**NOTE:** Open root `build.gradle` in your project and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/251dbf0e193eb574d00445bda1224d669c4c6757#diff-c197962302397baf3a4cc36463dce5ea). Clean project after doing this.

name: 1.7.0-b1
body:
- Code cleanup
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/101, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/100, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/96
- Gradle 3.0.0
- API 27

**NOTE:**
* Update your Android SDK, make sure to install Build-tools 27, Android API 27, and latest version of support repository.
* You need to start again (re-import the sample project) :(
* Read here to change the splash screen icon [Customization: Basic](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Customization:-Basic#splash-screen)
* Check [Dashboard Cofiguration](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Dashboard-Configuration) and [Wallpaper Json Structure](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Wallpaper-Json-Structure) again if you are using them

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/92, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/91, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/86
- Updated translation
- Added an option to apply wallpaper on both homescreen and lockscreen https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/89

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/85
- Improved stability and performance
- Updated translations

- Fixed crash on Xiaomi devices
- Update translation
- Added Urdu translation

**NOTE:** Open `AndroidManifest.xml` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/dbb25aafca297f047ae06d5ccd69670e6bc42f95) after updating
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/74

- Fixed Muzei art source loader
- Separate tabs icon color, follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/6725c21c2bbf3c401f1d0d7ab56ecaa74ede767c) to add them

- Improved search
- Size part will be hidden if wallpaper size is unknown in wallpaper preview https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/70

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/64
- Fixed favorites wallpaper gone after updating the database https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/65
- Fixed download options still visible even `enable_wallpaper_download` already set to false https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/69
- Fixed unable to pass splash screen when there's a background task still running
- Fixed typo https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/67
- Updated translation
- Improved wallpaper downloader
- Improved auto generated wallpaper name

**NOTE:** This is a stable version, 1.5.0-b1 - 1.5.0-b4 is buggy, it's recommended to immediately switch to this or **newest** release.

name: 1.5.0-b2
body: - Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/61, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/62, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/63

name: 1.5.0-b1
body:
- Fixed bugs
- Redesigned
- Improved stability and performance
- Wallpaper tabs (latest, wallpapers, and categories) https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/22
- Background downloading https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/48
- Added an option where to apply the wallpaper https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/31
- Added `setLatestWallpapersDisplayMax(int)` and `setHighQualityPreviewEnabled(boolean)` to `Configuration`
- Removed some configuration, check [latest commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/397c036b30aad4da1063ea73cd2302c2120122cd) on sample project.
- Added new colors, check [`colors.xml`](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/blob/master/app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml) in sample project to add them.

**How to add app shortcuts on Android 7.1?**
Follor the tutorial [here](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Create-App-Shortcuts-on-Android-7.1)
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/49

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/47, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/45, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/32
- Added select or unselect all menu in filter dialog https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/40
- Improved category count
  - 100 - 999 will be displayed as 99+
  - 1026 will be displayed as 1K+, 8682 will be displayed as 8K+
  - More than 9000 will be displayed as 9K+
- Added Bengali, German, and Portuguese translation
- Added support for json output from php https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/46, read [here](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Json-Output-from-PHP) for more info
- More configurations, check [here](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Dashboard-Configuration)
- Support different json structure, check [here](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Wallpaper-Json-Structure)
- Removed unnecessary configuration, check [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/397c036b30aad4da1063ea73cd2302c2120122cd)
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/28

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/26, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/27
- Added more translation (French and Russian)
- Added share app and rate & review to navigation drawer
- Redesigned about, iconized social buttons, follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/e791e062e7393654165a76d9fe027717871f3b97) to add social links.
- Removed default font to reduce library size, previously default font is Roboto, if you want to use it again as default follow [this customization wiki](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/wiki/Customization:-Advanced#5-dashboard-font).
- Removed unused colors, follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/dec9fe2bd2c9a467c5b55fe336bf35fcb23e7d9a) to remove them.
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/25

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/24
- Fixed unable to insert data to database with duplicate entry
- Fixed Turkish and Polish translation
- Added Dutch translation
- Now you can display an image from url inside `contributors.xml`, check [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/4f3f01bda17bf48b5cff92e64bffe982205c5e9f).

- Code cleanup
- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/17, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/1
- Improved stability and performance
- Improved inbuilt wallpaper apply
- Localization
- Redesigned wallpapers grid
- Added an option to change navigation view header style

### How to Update
1. Open `dashboard_configurations.xml` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/aa31a81e10f6275b7d91d3b00da743248fc5e633)
2. Open module:app `build.gradle` and change Wallpaper Board version to 1.2.4
3. Sync project with gradle files

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/16
- Fixed wallpaper crop on Android below Lollipop
- Fixed supports for 18:9 and 18.5:9 screen aspect ratio
- Improved wallpaper preview https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/13
- Added tutorial how to use the dashboard for user, can be reset from settings
- Added an option to disable shadow
- Added an option to enable rounded corner wallpaper card
- Redesigned default navigation drawer icon

### How to Update
1. Open `gradle-wrapper.properties` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/2cff127cf0a963bb2c107082e4d65c6e5addcb2c)
2. Open Project: `build.gradle` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/7ed47bdcf55b8fc5a228ae63654712beccf2882f)
3. Open `dashboard_configurations.xml` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/5069a07b5a3b4a8e8df76c27aa58569af1c7b572)
4. Open module:app `build.gradle` and change Wallpaper Board version to 1.2.0
5. Sync project with gradle files

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/11
- Code cleanup

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/7, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/8, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/9
- Fixed inbuilt wallpaper crop
- Fixed splash screen loading time
- Improved wallpaper preview
- Code cleanup
- Updated dependency
- Redesigned settings and about
- On API 24 (Nougat) apply wallpaper set for both home and lockscreen

### How to Update
1. Open project `build.gradle` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/e2dcb587b500856a2524208c77bf616aeccea82e)
2. Open `gradle-wrapper.properties` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/c9e468925226656566347426c29889bfdc0936cf)
3. Open `colors.xml` and follow [this commit](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/53ac48fec7c9eb27d276d14f7e0d54cb6f93be9f) or just copy paste `colors.xml` from [sample project](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/tree/master/app/src/main/res/values)
4. Open module:app `build.gradle` and change WallpaperBoard version to 1.1.0
5. Sync project with gradle files

**NOTE:** You need to update Android SDK, make sure to update Android Support Repository to latest version

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/1, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/5, https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/6
- Updated dependency
- `splash_screen_duration` inside `dashboard_configurations.xml` no longer used, just remove that, latest commit [here](https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard-sample/commit/48730711882b6a3670ead6886322267853398018).

**NOTE:** 
1. You need to update Android SDK, make sure to update Android Support Repository to latest version
2. If you don't want to create separate link for `url` and `thumbUrl` in wallpaper json, now you can set both of them with the same url. Dashboard will automatically resize image to display wallpaper thumbnail on server side (resize image -> download resized image -> display) which is faster.

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/3
- Fixed contributors not hidden correctly
- Updated dependency

- Fixed https://github.com/danimahardhika/wallpaperboard/issues/2 wallpaper search column count
- Fixed tablet layout
- Fixed inbuilt wallpaper crop
- Updated dependency
- Initial release
